column6: To develop and provide advice to the Board on the strategic direction and to lead the Authority in the delivery of the strategic aims in order to best achieve the purpose set out in the Gangmasters (Licensing) Act 2004.  The Chief Executive is also responsible to the Chairman and Board for the day to day management and executive leadership and for the performance of the organisation.  In addition the Chief Executive is the formal GLA Accounting Officer with accountabilites to the DEFRA Accounting Officer.
